issue.title: [Go] remove deprecated Feather format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5308](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5308). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
we should probably consider removing the feather format files from the Go backend.

Feather is deprecated and right now the Go implementation is just the result of the automatically generated code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5308?focusedCommentId=16841969) by Sebastien Binet (sbinet):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4300
